Package part1

Class CLI

java.lang.Object
part1.CLI
public class CLI
extends java.lang.Object
This class implements a CLI program to use the Mail Service
Author:
David Llop Roig, Anna Julia Naval

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args) throws java.io.IOException, java.text.ParseException, java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
      Main function, basically a do ... while(not quit)
      Parameters:
      args - main ars
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - thrown when unable to use the desired file as a mail store file
      java.io.IOException - thrown when unable to use the desired file as a mail store file
      java.text.ParseException - thrown when unable to parse from String to int
      java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - thrown when unable to run windows command "cls"

    • decodeCommand

      public void decodeCommand​(java.lang.String[] command) throws java.text.ParseException
      This function calls the execution of the requested command, if it exists and is available
      Parameters:
      command - User input split by spaces
      Throws:
      java.text.ParseException - thrown when unable to parse from String to int
